show.title: Happily Never After
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://applinks.kukufm.com/5KCiQmW4cL6qGCyT6
show.description: Happily Never After follows Rajveer Singhania, whose life spirals into chaos when his fiancée Veda Mehta mistakes his pregnant sister-in-law Shanaya Birla for his mistress. What starts as a misunderstanding at an engagement turns into a dark, twisted tale of betrayal, violence, and shocking truths.
show.description_secondary: Happily Never After follows Rajveer Singhania, whose life spirals into chaos when his fiancée Veda Mehta mistakes his pregnant sister-in-law Shanaya Birla for his mistress. What starts as a misunderstanding at an engagement turns into a dark, twisted tale of betrayal, violence, and shocking truths.
